title: Bug 49536If no webapps deployed, accessing a URL returns 200 OK with no content instead of 404
OB: Bug 49536If no webapps deployed, accessing a URL returns 200 OK with no content instead of 404 HelloI've just downloaded http://mirror.veriportal.com/apache/tomcat/tomcat7/v7.0.0beta/bin/apachetomcat7.0.0.zipIf I start a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps on it and access a URL, it returns HTTP code 200 OK with no content, instead of an HTTP error 404.CheersS.
